description: The image depicts Noah's Ark listing severely to one side, with Noah and various animal pairs struggling to maintain balance on the deck. The extreme tilt of the large vessel suggests a significant imbalance of weight. The underlying humor stems from attributing this precarious situation not to rough seas or divine judgment, but to the mundane and absurd problem of the elephants being ill, implying their collective weight shift is causing the instability. This highlights the irony of a biblical-scale event being affected by a common ailment among the passengers.
caption: “Blast! ... The elephants are sick again!”
